summary: After the rise of the Taliban in Afghanistan and the restriction of women in public life, a pre-teen girl is forced to masquerade as a boy in order to find work to support her mother and grandmother.
cast: Marina Golbahari|Khwaja Nader|Mohammad Arif Herati|Zubaida Sahar|Mohamad Haref Harati|Hamida Refah|Gul Rehman Ghorbandi|Mohammad Nadir Khwaja
title: Osama
